response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us at $1,200,000, but considering its importance to you, we believe it's time to make this dream acquisition a reality. We are offering you the chance to own it for $950,000. This price not only ensures a significant saving for you but also reflects our commitment to making high-quality products accessible to those who appreciate their true worth. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your collection or business with a piece that truly stands out. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
